Title: The Bay

Synopsis:
The picturesque coastal town of Claridge, Chesapeake Bay, lives by the sea, is the livelihood of the community. French When two biological researchers an astonishing level of toxicity in the water, trying to warn the mayor, but he refuses to cause panic in the quiet village. As a result, it unleashes a deadly plague that infects the inhabitants of Claridge with a mutant strain of parasites capable of taking control of their minds and ultimately, of their bodies. THE BAY is a brutal and creepy monster movie for the XXI century, tells the story of how a small town is cast in absolute terror.
